frontmatter.title: Partner with us - Danube Home Franchise
frontmatter.heading: What You Will Get With A Danube Home Franchise
frontmatter.caption: Benefits of this Partnership Model

accordion.title: MARKET AND SITE AREA RESEARCH
accordion.content: Our R&D teams have conducted intensive market analysis covering all the aspects important to set up a franchise.

accordion.title: SITE SELECTION
accordion.content: We help you choose the best possible locations ensuring ease of access, convenience, high visibility etc.

accordion.title: STORE LAYOUT & DESIGN
accordion.content: We offer our expertise on the store layout as well as the designing of the interior and the exterior of the store.

accordion.title: SUPPORT SYSTEM
accordion.content: We offer support of products, Marketing as well as operations to ensure that the quality is maintained and there is standardization in all our operations across all locations.

accordion.title: RECRUITMENT SUPPORT & TRAINING
accordion.content: We also take responsibility to recruit and train in-store staff and managers, to make them well-versed with the product offerings, store layout, information on complementary products etc.

accordion.title: COMPLETE OVERSIGHT
accordion.content: In addition to all the pre- opening support, we also offer complete oversight.

popupData.heading: Partner with us as a Franchise
popupData.caption: For further consultation from our team please fill up the details below
